items.question: How does the whois checker gather data?
items.answer: The whois checker queries authoritative registries, caches nothing sensitive, and refreshes every request in real time.

items.question: What TLDs are supported?
items.answer: Every major gTLD and hundreds of ccTLDs are available, and you can add private registries to the whois checker as needed.

items.question: Is the service free?
items.answer: The core whois checker is free for unlimited lookups, with pro monitoring for teams that need automation.

items.question: How accurate are the results?
items.answer: Because the whois checker connects directly to registry WHOIS servers, you see the same data registrars rely on.

items.question: Can I check multiple domains at once?
items.answer: Yesâ€”upload CSVs or paste lists, and the whois checker will process them in parallel.

cta.title: Ready to Act on Real Whois Data?
